description: This year, the stock market has been doing great. But what about everyone else?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, November 5, 2013
contentencoded: If you take the year-long perspective, the stock market has been doing just fine. The S&P 500 is up more then 24 percent over the last 12 months. But does it feel that way off of Wall Street? Julie Niemann, analyst at Smith Moore and company in St. Louis, gives Marketplace Morning Report her perspective.

teaser: This year, the stock market has been doing great. But what about everyone else?
title: Wall Street is doing great. What about your street?
